channel.title: Posts on FinanceCraftedSheets
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on FinanceCraftedSheets

item.title: Emergency Fund vs Debt Payoff: Which Comes First?
item.description: The ultimate guide to deciding whether to build an emergency fund or pay off debt first. Real math, real scenarios, and a framework that actually works.

item.title: How to Automate Personal Finance (So You Stop Thinking About Money)
item.description: Set up automated payments, transfers, and tracking so your finances run on autopilot. Stop managing money manually and let the system do the work.

item.title: Side Hustle Taxes: The Complete Guide for Freelancers & Gig Workers
item.description: Navigate side hustle taxes without panic. Learn what you owe, what you can deduct, how to pay quarterly taxes, and how to stay compliant year-round.

item.title: 5 Excel Spreadsheets Every Freelancer Needs Before Tax Season Hits
item.description: The IRS doesn't wait. Build these five spreadsheets now so tax season isn't a disaster.

item.title: Avalanche vs Snowball: Which Debt Payoff Method Actually Works for You
item.description: Math comparison of debt payoff methods with real numbers and timelines. Why psychology matters more than optimization. How to choose based on your personality.

item.title: How to Track Spending Without Apps: The 10-Minute Weekly Review
item.description: Manual spending tracking methods using spreadsheets and the weekly review habit that keeps budgets on track. Why manual tracking forces behavioral change better than automation.

item.title: Negotiate Your APR: Scripts and Steps That Actually Work
item.description: When to call your credit card company. Exact scripts for APR negotiation. Hardship programs explained. What to do if they say no. Real example: negotiated from 18.5% to 14.2% in one call.

item.title: Rental Property ROI – The Metrics That Actually Matter
item.description: Gross rent multiplier is lazy. Here's what metrics actually tell you if a deal makes sense.

item.title: Side Hustle Income Tracking – Stop Losing Money Without Knowing It
item.description: 73% of side hustlers are bleeding money through hidden costs. Track this or watch profit disappear into fees.

item.title: Sizing Your Emergency Fund for Variable Income (The Real Formula)
item.description: The 3-6 months rule doesn't work for variable income. Here's how to calculate YOUR emergency fund number with real examples. Includes HYSA options and a realistic build-out timeline.

item.title: Track Your Net Worth Monthly – It's Not What You Think It Is
item.description: Your net worth isn't a vanity metric. It's the only number that tells you if you're actually getting richer or just moving money around.

item.title: What Actually Affects Your Credit Score (And What Doesn't)
item.description: The 5 credit score factors with percentages explained. Common myths debunked. Quick wins to boost your score fast. Real numbers from someone who improved from 580 to 750.

item.title: Zero-Based Budgeting: Every Dollar Has a Job
item.description: Learn what zero-based budgeting is and why it works so well for debt payoff. Step-by-step setup guide with real numbers from someone who paid off $43k in debt using this method.
